title: "Self-driving lab used to improve nanocrystal understanding"
excerpt: "Control Engineering reports that UB researcher Kristofer Reyes and researchers from North Carolina State University have developed and demonstrated a “self-driving lab” that uses artificial intelligence and fluidic systems to advance understanding of metal halide perovskite nanocrystals."
